ComicInfo.Summary:
"RUDOLPH ON THE ROAD TO FUNVILLE"
Every boy and girl needs a momma, like a puppy needs a bowl. The funny-sad clown series for a funny-sad clown world continues with a mother-daughter road trip illustrated by ZOE THOROGOOD (The Impending Blindness of Billie Scott).
*List of covers and their creators:* | Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | |-------|---------|-----------------|------------------| | A | Cover A | Zoe Thorogood | 1 | | B | Cover B | Martin Simmonds | 2 |
ComicInfo.Title: Rudolph On the Road To Funville
